窩.definition: nest; pit or hollow on the human body; lair; den; place; to harbor or shelter; to hold in check; to bend; classifier for litters and broods

窩主.definition: person who harbors criminals; receiver (of stolen goods)

窩囊.definition: to feel vexed; annoyed; good-for-nothing; stupid and cowardly

窩工.definition: (of workers) to have no work to do; to be underutilized (due to lack of supplies, poor organization by management etc)

窩心.definition: aggrieved; dejected; (Tw, southern China) to be moved by a kind gesture etc; to feel gratified; to feel warm inside

窩脖兒.definition: to suffer a snub; to meet with a rebuff

窩裡反.definition: see 窩裡鬥|窝里斗[wo1 li5 dou4]

窩裡橫.definition: (coll.) meek and civil in public, but a tyrant at home

窩闊臺.definition: Ögedei Khan (1186-1242), a son of Genghis Khan

窩闊臺汗.definition: Ögedei Khan (1186-1242), a son of Genghis Khan
